section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-407b936c elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

h2.a: Dr. Richard Izquierdo Health and Science Charter School

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-2f29021 elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-height-min-height elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-items-middle elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.h1: DIHS is closed effective Monday, March 16th until at least May 15th.

div.h2: We are committed to finding ways to ensure your children continue to learn during this period of school closure. We are updating information on remote learning, food service, and other questions as it is available. Continue to check here for more information.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-39dc42d7 elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.p: Below are the education services we have implemented into our Remote Learning Plans.

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-59b6cc6 elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.p: The New York City Department of Education is committed to making three free meals available daily for any New Yorker – not just children. Any New Yorker who wants one can get three free meals a day at more than 400 Meal Hubs across the city.

ul.li: Meals can be picked up at all Meal Hubs from 7:30AM to 1:30PM, Monday through Friday

Meal Hubs will operate for children and families from 7:30AM to 11:30AM, and for adults from 11:30AM to 1:30PM
No one will be turned away at any time
All adults and children can pick up three meals at one time
Vegetarian and halal options available at all sites
No dining space is available, so meals must be eaten off premises
Parents and guardians may pick up meals for their children
Use this tool to find a location near you: HERE

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-3a47d423 elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.p: Below are the links to all mailing that have been sent home related to school closures due to Coronavirus.

ul.li: DIHS Remote Learning Schedule Effective April 13th

span.a: NY State of Health Letter to Families

ul.li:
Resources in Spanish/ Recursos en español
Resources for Hispanic and Latino Clients and Mental Health Providers
GUI_A DUELO COVID19-2020
GUI_A PSICOLO_GICA COVID-2019
Stress Management

span.a: Head of School interviews – A message from the Board

li.strong: On Tuesday April 7th, the board is inviting you to join in on a zoom call for a virtual interview of the prospective Head of school. The call will be from 5pm to 8pm.
To access the call on Zoom, please click HERE

p.span: If you are a parent and work as a healthcare provider, FDNY, NYPD, OEM or other eligible front-line worker, there are Regional Enrichment Centers (RECs) set up for your children. For more information, eligible parents can complete the survey here

article.class: elementor-post elementor-grid-item post-7921 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-board

div.p: The next Board Meeting will be held on April 16th from 6pm-8pm. Zoom Link: https://zoom.us/j/8549819705 Meeting ID: 854 981 9705One tap mobile+19292056099,,8549819705# US (New York)+13126266799,,8549819705#

section.class: elementor-element elementor-element-d92d558 elementor-section-stretched elementor-section-content-middle elementor-section-boxed elementor-section-height-default elementor-section-height-default elementor-section elementor-top-section

div.p: Due to COVID-19, Dr. Richard Izquierdo Health and Science Charter School has extended its application window to align with the Charter Center’s Common application and allow families dealing with crisis additional time to complete the online application. The deadline is now April 24th and our lottery will take place on May 1st at 4:00pm. A recording will be posted on the website shortly after. Apply online now!
